original_text: Now all the Athenians and the foreigners who lived there would spend their time in nothing except telling or hearing something new.
korean_text: 모든 아덴 사람과 거기서 나그네 된 외국인들이 가장 새로운 것을 말하고 듣는 것 이외에는 달리 시간을 쓰지 않음이더라

sentences.original_text: Now all the Athenians and the foreigners
would spend their time in nothing
except telling or hearing something new
sentences.korean_translation: 새로운 무언가를 말하거나 듣는 것만 빼고요
